title: Carnegie Science at the Astronomy Festival on the National Mall | Carnegie Science
text:
In-Person
Carnegie Science at the Astronomy Festival on the National Mall
On September 20, 2025, from 5–11 p.m., the National Mall becomes one of the biggest stargazing parties in the country, with telescopes, hands-on activities, and experts from leading science institutions. Stop by the Carnegie Science table to meet scientists who study Earth, space, and even rocks from space—build your own model Solar System, safely view the Sun, and split light into a rainbow of colors as you explore the universe with us!
September 20, 2025
Add to Calendar
5:00pm - 5:00pm EDT
Location:
National Mall
4th to 6th Street, SW
Washington, DC 20017
United States
